content.text:
# Minister-President of the German-speaking Community

The minister-president of the German-speaking Community () is the head of the Government of the German-speaking Community of Belgium, one of the three Communities of the country.

Timeline
ImageSize = width:800 height:auto barincrement:12
PlotArea  = top:10 bottom:50 right:130 left:20
AlignBars = late
Colors     =
id:liberal   value:rgb(0,0,1)   legend:Liberal
id:christian value:rgb(1,0.6,0)   legend:Christian_Democrat
id:socialist value:rgb(1,0,0)  legend:Social_Democrat
id:gray1  value:gray(0.8)
id:gray2  value:gray(0.9)
DateFormat = dd/mm/yyyy
Period     = from:01/01/1984 till:01/01/2026
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:gray1 unit:year increment:5 start:1985
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:gray2 unit:year increment:1 start:1984
Legend     = columns:4 left:150 top:24 columnwidth:120
TextData =
pos:(20,27) textcolor:black fontsize:M
text:"Political parties:"
BarData =
barset:PM
PlotData=
width:5 align:left fontsize:S shift:(5,-4) anchor:till
barset:PM
from: 30/01/1984 till: 11/11/1986 color:liberal text:"Fagnoul" fontsize:10
from: 11/11/1986 till: 06/07/1999 color:christian text:"Maraite I-III" fontsize:10
from: 06/07/1999 till: 25/05/2014 color:Socialist text:"Lambertz I-III" fontsize:10
from: 25/05/2014 till: 06/07/2025 color:christian text:"Paasch I-III" fontsize:10
